purpose.p: Declaration used to import stylesheet modules, differing from xsl:include in that the declarations and rules in the importing stylesheet have a higher import precedence, than those in the imported stylesheet.

usage.p: xsl:import elements must precede all other declarations and user-defined data elements.
The declarations and template rules in the importing stylesheet have a higher precedence than those that are imported.
xsl:apply-imports may be used to partially override the precedence of items in the importing stylesheet.

property.name: href
property.description: URI that identifies the stylesheet module to be imported. The way that the reference is resolved is implementation defined.
